survey_name: Online Banking Security Features Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on customer satisfaction and perceptions regarding the security features of online banking services.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online banking services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use online banking services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following security features are most important to you when using online banking? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which of the following security features are most important to you when using online banking? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current security measures provided by your online banking service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current security measures provided by your online banking service?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security issue (e.g., unauthorized access, phishing) with your online banking account?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the 'Prefer not to say' option is included for privacy concerns.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security issue (e.g., unauthorized access, phishing) with your online banking account?

questions.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see in your online banking service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the input field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see in your online banking service?
